description: Chile puts first school in quarantine and updates the protocol of quarantine for educational establishments. In case a student has a direct relative with covid 19, she/he has to complete 14 day quarantine. If a student is infected with covid 19, his whole class will be quarantined. description:
People who test positive for COVID-19 are obliged to stay in quarantine for at least 14 days until symptoms disappear (the start date ist the day when first symptoms occurred). The same applies to people who have been in contact with someone who tested positive for COVID-19. Being in contact is defined as (at least one bullet point must apply):
- Have maintained more than 15 minutes of face-to-face contact, less than a meter away.
- Have shared a closed space for 2 hours or more, such as places like offices, jobs, meetings, schools.
- Living or sleeping in the same home or home-like places, such as hostels, boarding schools, closed institutions, nursing homes, hotels, residences, among others.
- Having moved in any closed means of transport to a proximity of less than one meter with another occupant of the means of transport.
